name: graphql-retag
description: Helpful utility that wraps `graphql-tag` module for parsing GraphQL queries, supports nesting fragments and resolves dependencies.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && tsc && cp package.json README.md build
scripts.release: git pull --rebase && npm run test && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish build && git push --tags && git push

author: Ivan Zakharchanka
